statements: SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%win%';
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM game_events ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_timestamp FROM game_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM game_events;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_data FROM game_logs WHERE player_id = 456 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 2 AND event_name LIKE '%achievement%';
SELECT * FROM game_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM game_events GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_stats ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM log_messages WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 10;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM player_stats WHERE total_score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM player_stats WHERE games_played >= 10;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM log_messages WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'login';
SELECT player_id, username, total_score FROM player_stats ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE error_type = 'critical' ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT player_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'win';
SELECT player_id, total_score, last_login FROM player_stats WHERE total_score > 1000 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT log_id, error_type, error_timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE error_type = 'critical' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, username, games_played, last_login FROM player_stats INNER JOIN game_events ON player_stats.player_id = game_events.player_id WHERE event_type = 'win' AND games_played > 10;
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time, game_mode FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_id, total_score, high_score, average_score FROM player_scores;
SELECT log_id, player_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM player_logs;
SELECT event_id, session_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_data FROM game_events;

SELECT session_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_data FROM game_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
